channel.title: I need help getting on my server
channel.description:
Hey, guys, Im new here,
And pretty much out of options. :(
I need help getting on my server (as the title says)
I have:
[ul][li]A source (Devolution)[/li] [li]No-ip[/li] [li]Java JDK 6u13 INSTALLED WHERE IT'S SUPPOST TO BE[/li] [li]A Client[/li] [li]A compiler[/li][/ul]
I click compile, It compiles good with no errors.
I open No-ip with my host name (deducted.no-ip.org)
I click runserver, it says: Decolution Server 7.0 - Created by Winten/Bakatool -------------------------------------------------------- Loading npcs... drops... spawn list... done!
I go to my client, put my no-ip in, and username & pass, and it says error connecting to server.
I have a new port set to 43594 in Network and sharing Center > Windows Firewall > Change settings > Exeptions called RSPS
I dont care about port forwarding atm... so lets drop that
and... that's about it
So, if someone can point me in the right direction that would be great :D
Thanks
~ Me ~

item.title: I need help getting on my server
item.dc:creator: @Gratlofatic Gratlofatic
item.source: I need help getting on my server

item.title: I need help getting on my server
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Bigbucks Mod Bigbucks
item.description:
@Mod_Bigbucks wrote:

If you don’t want to portforward YET, user “localhost” or “127.0.0.1”

Read full topic
item.source: I need help getting on my server

item.title: I need help getting on my server
item.dc:creator: @Gratlofatic Gratlofatic
item.description:
@Gratlofatic wrote:

That website has done nothing for me since i started this project.

All these guides I’ve read show a linksys router set up. I use dlink and it’s mostly the same and i do it and nothing happens!

this is what getting me mad!

there’s nothing more i can do!

so, if anyone knows a guide (probably not because i’ve seen ALL of them) for port forwarding for DLINK not LINKSYS please tell me

Read full topic
item.source: I need help getting on my server

item.title: I need help getting on my server
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

You have to portforward in order to connect with your No-IP. www.portforward.com

Read full topic
item.source: I need help getting on my server

item.title: I need help getting on my server

item.description:
@Gratlofatic wrote:

Hey, guys, Im new here,

And pretty much out of options.

I need help getting on my server (as the title says)

I have:

[ul][li]A source (Devolution)[/li]
[li]No-ip[/li]
[li]Java JDK 6u13 INSTALLED WHERE IT’S SUPPOST TO BE[/li]
[li]A Client[/li]
[li]A compiler[/li][/ul]

I click compile, It compiles good with no errors.

I open No-ip with my host name (deducted.no-ip.org)

I click runserver, it says:
Decolution Server 7.0 - Created by Winten/Bakatool

Loading npcs… drops… spawn list…
done!

I go to my client, put my no-ip in, and username & pass, and it says error connecting to server.

I have a new port set to 43594 in Network and sharing Center > Windows Firewall > Change settings > Exeptions called RSPS

I dont care about port forwarding atm… so lets drop that

and… that’s about it

So, if someone can point me in the right direction that would be great
